Minichamps 400038374 Ford Focus RS WRC 03 2003 Acropolis Rally Winner M. Märtin/M. Park

First WRC win for Markko Märtin
44th WRC win for Ford
First WRC win for Focus RS WRC 03



Markko Märtin begain competing in WRC events in 1997 but things didn't really take off until 2002 as he scored 20 championship points driving for Ford.

In 2003 Märtin won his first WRC event - the Acropolis Rally - with co-driver Michael Park. Märtin & Park took the lead from François Duval in stage 2 and held the lead for the rest of the rally winning by a margin of 46 seconds over Carlos Sainz.

The tragic death of Park in an accident in the 2005 RAC Rally saw Märtin retire from WRC competition.
